Songs of England (Bath)
Ransome and Marles Sports Ground, Newark, Notts March contest - 1st Kirkby, 2nd Ormonde Colliery, 3rd Markham Main. Prizes - 1st £35 and trophy, 2nd £20 and trophy, 3rd £10 and trophy. 11 bands competed.
June 1, 2016, 11:05 a.m. Feb. 19, 2019, 3:25 p.m.
1 Markham Main Colliery Band Edwin Griffiths
2 Kirkby Old Harold Lowe
3 Whaley Bridge Brass F. Wood
4 Royston New Monckton Colliery Institute William Foster
Unknown Result Loscoe Miners J. C. Webster
